function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global outbreak of COVID-19","Impact":"High mortality rate and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Precautionary measures, social distancing, isolation, and quarantine","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, air purifiers, and personal protective equipment","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, high-risk individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective cure or treatment for COVID-19","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus and high infection rates","Mitigation":"Accelerated research for medications and vaccines, development of effective treatment protocols","Technologies":"Vaccine development, antiviral medications, research and testing facilities","People":"Global population, researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Misunderstanding of transmission routes for COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in public spaces, underestimation of precautions","Mitigation":"Education on transmission routes, improved ventilation and air quality, adoption of updated safety guidelines","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, educational materials, communication technology for safety guidelines","People":"Public, businesses, organizations","Owner":"Public health agencies, government organizations, businesses"}]}
